segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing the sink, cascading onto the cabinet, and I can't help but feel a pang of frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There seems to be a growing puddle at her feet, but she doesn't notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she will realize how slippery it has become.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are behind her, and I feel a mix of excitement and worry as they plot their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing precariously on a stool that looks ready to tip over, and I can hardly watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl beside him with her arm raised, eagerly anticipating her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
